title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.14 - Wind and storm hazards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.14 - Wind and storm hazards

State Regulations

An amusement device, temporary structure, viewing stand
or tent, which is exposed to wind or storm shall not be operated or used under
dangerous weather conditions except to release or discharge
occupants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-1.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
